```py
>>> midx = pd.MultiIndex.from_product([['A0','A1'], ['B0','B1','B2','B3']])
>>> columns = ['foo', 'bar']
>>> dfmi = pd.DataFrame(np.arange(16).reshape((len(midx), len(columns))),
...                     index=midx, columns=columns) 
```

```py
>>> dfmi.loc[(slice(None), slice('B0', 'B1')), :]
 foo  bar
 A0 B0    0    1
 B1    2    3
 A1 B0    8    9
 B1   10   11 
```

```py
>>> idx = pd.IndexSlice
>>> dfmi.loc[idx[:, 'B0':'B1'], :]
 foo  bar
 A0 B0    0    1
 B1    2    3
 A1 B0    8    9
 B1   10   11 
```
